imports.description: Contains the names of the files contained in the assets manifest section.

parents.description: Contains the names of parent entrypoints.

ManifestItem.description: Describes a manifest asset that links the emitted path to the producing asset.

file.description: The path absolute URL (this indicates that the path is absolute from the server's root directory) to file.

src.description: The source path relative to the context.

entrypoints.description: Enables/disables generation of the entrypoints manifest section.

filename.description: Specifies the filename of the output file on disk. By default the plugin will emit `manifest.json` inside the 'output.path' directory.

filter.description: Allows filtering the files which make up the manifest.

generate.description: A function that receives the manifest object, modifies it, and returns the modified manifest.

prefix.description: Specifies a path prefix for all keys in the manifest.

serialize.description: A function that receives the manifest object and returns the manifest string.
